duties_responsibilities.duty: Evaluate and treat patients with medically prescribed physical therapy programs.
Supervise Physical Therapy Assistants and make initial admission/evaluation visits.
Notify assigned Clinical Team Manager of OASIS scores within established timelines.
Document observations, clinical findings, problems, skilled interventions/treatments, goals and discharge plans.
Perform other duties as assigned consistent with skills and training for this position in alignment with the goals and mission of the organization.

education_certification.credential: Doctorate in Physical Therapy (DPT) or Master's degree in Physical Therapy
